cont.entity_a: Auto-focus is super fast and tack sharp. Faster auto-focusing and sharper images. Fast and silent auto-focus.
cont.entity_b: Fast and accurate autofocus. Fast focusing and sharp images.

cont.entity_a: Physically large and heavy, but well-built. Heavy but offers excellent image quality.
cont.entity_b: Heavy compared to zoom lenses. Lightweight and compact.

cont.entity_a: Image quality is amazing. Great sharpness and contrast. Sharp images with good color saturation.
cont.entity_b: Produces beautiful sharp images. Sharp images with virtually no distortion. Sharp images with smooth bokeh. Produces sharp images with good background blur. Sharp images with beautiful color saturation.

cont.entity_a: Super low light performance across all focal ranges with image stabilization. Excellent photos in all lighting situations, even on a night safari drive. Image stabilization makes low-light photos easy. Indoor photos are excellent without a flash. Great for low light and fast enough for action shots.
cont.entity_b: Great for low light photography. Good for low light conditions.

cont.entity_a: Covers wide angle to mid-range telephoto, perfect for walk-around purposes. Versatile for various photography situations. Perfect all-purpose lens.
cont.entity_b: Great portrait lens for the price. Excellent for portraits and close-ups. Great for sports and action shots. Great for portraits and indoor sports.
Good value for money. Affordable and provides excellent image quality.

cont.entity_a: Constant f2.8 throughout zoom range. Wide focal length with low aperture and image stabilization.
cont.entity_b: No image stabilization but fast aperture compensates.

cont.entity_a: Image stabilization makes low-light photos easy. Image stabilizer is loud due to older system.
cont.entity_b: No image stabilization but fast aperture compensates.
